mapper.select: select * from ( select * from book order by book_title ) where rownum <= 12
select * from ( select * from book order by book_price_for_sale ) where rownum <= 12 and book_price_for_sale not in(0)
select * from (select * from ( SELECT ISBN, COUNT(ISBN) cnt FROM BOOK_LIKE GROUP BY ISBN ORDER BY COUNT(ISBN) DESC) where rownum <= 12) a, book b where a.isbn = b.isbn order by cnt desc

select bk.isbn, bk.book_title, bk.writer_name, bk.translator_name, bk.publisher_name, bk.book_tot_page, bk.book_published_date, bk.book_price, bk.book_price_for_sale, bk.book_stock, bk.book_story, bk.book_img, au.author from book bk, authors au where bk.isbn = au.isbn and bk.isbn = #{isbn} and rownum <= 1

select * from (select bk.isbn, bk.book_title, bk.writer_name, bk.translator_name, bk.publisher_name, bk.book_tot_page, bk.book_published_date, bk.book_price, bk.book_price_for_sale, bk.book_stock, bk.book_story, bk.book_img, au.author from book bk, authors au where bk.isbn = au.isbn order by bk.isbn) where author =#{author} and rownum <= 6
select b.*, bk.user_id, bk.like_book from book b inner join book_like bk on b.isbn = bk.isbn where bk.user_id = #{user_id} order by like_book
